name: Amara Living
overview:
AMARA is a leading International online boutique specialising in luxury gift ideas, beautiful wedding gifts and inspirational interior design ideas for your home.

Amara is the brainchild of respected Interior Designer Sam Hood which unbelievably she only created in January 2005. Under Sam’s expert guidance Amara has assembled a team of buyers who have produced one of the finest online collections of luxury gift ideas and wedding gift suggestions. Amara’s many successes have been built on excellent customer service with close attention being paid to understanding what their clients need.

Amara is the largest online supplier of Missoni Home and boasts an impressive range of luxury home fashion brands including Ralph lauren Home. Amara also present huge collection of fantastic gift suggestions and wedding gift ideas available for immediate delivery.

Amara hold the majority of their luxury gift and wedding gift suggestions in stock and wherever possible deliver to UK addresses the next day. Sam has put together a team of customer service experts able to help you decide on which items are right for you. They also offer a luxury gift wrapping service for those buying presents and a Wedding list hosting service for those tying the knot. It is now possible to shop in US Dollars and Euros and it is possible to have your items shipped all over the World.
